properties.property: select comment_id commentId, doc_id docId, doc_comment docComment, user_name userName, comtime subTime, user_ip userIP, src_comment_id srcCommentId, status from td_cms_doc_comment t where t.doc_id = #[docId] and status = 1 order by comtime desc

select p.* from (select comment_id commentId, doc_id docId, doc_comment docComment, user_name userName, comtime subTime, comtime as str_subTime, user_ip userIP, src_comment_id srcCommentId, status from td_cms_doc_comment t where t.doc_id = #[docId] and status = 1 order by comtime desc) p where rownum < #[n]

select p.* from (select comment_id commentId, doc_id docId, doc_comment docComment, user_name userName, comtime subTime,comtime as str_subTime, user_ip userIP, src_comment_id srcCommentId, status from td_cms_doc_comment t where status = 1 order by comtime desc) p where rownum < #[n]

select p.* from (select comment_id commentId, doc_id docId, doc_comment docComment, user_name userName, comtime subTime,comtime as str_subTime, user_ip userIP, src_comment_id srcCommentId, status from td_cms_doc_comment t where t.doc_id in (select document_id from td_cms_document where channel_id in( select channel_id From td_cms_channel where display_name= #[channel] ) ) and status = 1 order by comtime desc) p where rownum < #[n]
select count(*) from td_cms_doc_comment t where t.doc_id = #[docId] and status = 1
select t.auditflag from td_cms_channel t where t.channel_id = #[channelId]
update td_cms_channel set auditflag = #[switchFlag] where channel_id = #[channelId]
